column1: Retrograde ejaculation may be caused by: - Diabetes - Some medicines including, drugs used to treat high blood pressure and some mood-altering drugs - Medicines or surgery to treat prostate or urethra problems
Your health care provider may recommend that you stop taking any medicines that may cause retrograde ejaculation.
Retrograde ejaculation that is caused by diabetes or surgery may be treated with drugs such as pseudoephedrine or imipramine.
